title: Mystery Gifting
body:
You love it. They are back. Time to spend $20 in the hopes of getting 5 cool skins.

My Friday Skins:
1. Dryad Soraka (520 RP) - meh, i wanted a raka skin anyway
2. Rocket Girl Tristana (975 RP) - Wasn't too thrilled. Used it in game, it feels so crisp. Really like it now.
3. Nunu Bot (1820 RP) - the epic troller skin. nice.
4. Workshop Nunu (520 RP) - didn't know you could random an Xmas skin.
5. Steel Legion Garen (1350 RP) - hooray -_-

Friend sent me a msytery gift too. TPA Nunu (750 RP) - real... Nunu AGAIN.

What about you? How's the mystery skin addiction treating you?

replies.body:
> I GOT SLAY BELLE KATARINA {{champion:55}}

cool. I got Kitty Cat Kat from a mystery gift last time they were out.
